```{r}
# Some coding basics that were omitteed in the first chapter. 
# You can do basic math in R
1/200*30
(59+73+2)/3
sin(pi/2)
```
```{r}
# you can create new objects with the assignment operator
x <- 3*4
x
```
```{r}
# you can combine multiple elements into a vector
primes <- c(2,3,5,7,11,13)
primes
```
```{r}
# You can apply basic arithmetic on vectors
primes * 2
primes - 1
```
```{r}
# (Option + -) gives you the assignment command
an_object_name_can_be_whatever_i_want <- 2.5
```

```{r}
seq(from = 1, to = 10)
seq(1, 10)
x <- "hello world"
x
```
